projects.title: Personal Website & Blog
projects.description: A modern personal website and blog built with Astro and React, featuring a responsive design and interactive components. Currently, the project is nothing more than a personal small website used for testing interesting ideas and honing my skills.

projects.title: Task Set Generator for evaluating distributed, real-time scheduling algorithms
projects.description: My Bachelors thesis project. This software generates task set with configurable boundaries for the purpose of testing novel scheduling algorithms.
